name: Auto Mover vs CEO
description:
The Wally empire must fall. Their grotesque means of creating mystery jerky and disgusting meats will end today! Take control of two cripples and a deadbeat as they fight against the establishment. The experience comes with:

- Encountering  Vegaful's goofy inhabitants with varying levels of opposition!

- Explore three different unique skillsets.

- Kill a CEO!

Credit for all of the Vegaful developers for their sprites and characters and game in general, to CombustingPixel for his work on the enforcers, Iamtheplayer for the special new song and FatherKuro for their sprites.
